SVGAttributeDiffuseConstant.summary: The diffuseConstant attribute represents the k<sub>d</sub> value in the Phong lighting model. In SVG, this can be any non-negative number.

remarks.para: It's used to determine the final RGB value of a given pixel. The brighter the lighting-color, the smaller this number should be.
You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
-Description of Phong reflection model on Wikipedia
